weekly_top_story.headline: Congress Proposes Extensions For Virtual Care In Funding Bill
weekly_top_story.summary: Congress included multi-year extensions for Medicare telehealth flexibilities and the Acute Hospital Care at Home program in its FY2026 funding package, providing long-term certainty for virtual care providers amid ongoing bipartisan funding challenges.

stories.headline: House Passes Fiscal Year 2026 Spending Bills
stories.summary: The House advanced the final FY2026 spending bills including HHS funding with key healthcare extenders, heightening urgency to avert a potential government shutdown by January 30 amid Senate negotiations.

stories.headline: Healthcare Preview for the Week of January 26, 2026
stories.summary: With the January 30 government funding deadline approaching, the Senate faces pressure to pass remaining appropriations bills including Labor-HHS with healthcare extenders, risking a partial shutdown otherwise.
